name: SectionsWheelPicker
description: SectionsWheelPicker component for presenting set of WheelPickers

props.name: itemHeight
props.description: Describe the height of each item in the WheelPicker

props.name: numberOfVisibleRows
props.description: Describe the number of rows visible

props.name: activeTextColor
props.description: Text color for the focused row

props.name: inactiveTextColor
props.description: Text color for other, non-focused rows
